text: EIGHTH: I hereby give, devise and bequeath all of the rest, residue and remainder of my estate to the [Organization-1] as trustee under the Revocable Trust Agreement and as thereafter amended to be distributed and disposed of pursuant to the terms of said Revocable Trust Agreement and any amendments thereto.

texts: all of the rest, residue and remainder of my estate
under the Revocable Trust Agreement and as thereafter amended to be distributed and disposed of pursuant to the terms of said Revocable Trust Agreement and any amendments thereto
